# # (Draft) Software Composition Analysis (SCA)


Software Composition Analysis (SCA) for .NET involves using specialized tools to find and manage security vulnerabilities, license risks, and outdated components within your .NET applications' open-source libraries (NuGet packages, etc.), ensuring supply chain security and compliance.

## What SCA Does for .NET

- **Dependency Mapping:** Creates a [[Software Bill Of Materials]] (SBOM) for your .NET project, listing all NuGet packages and their transitive dependencies.
- **Vulnerability Detection:** Identifies known CVEs (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) in those libraries.
- **License Compliance:** Flags licenses (e.g., GPL, MIT) to prevent legal issues.
- **Outdated Package Alerts:** Points out old versions that should be updated.





, with popular tools like [Snyk](https://www.google.com/search?q=Snyk&sca_esv=3d5baf122ad97e18&sxsrf=AE3TifOLxcipi7T5QdNiksjs-l78yGsWdw%3A1765855371162&ei=i9BAaZHTCdq0ptQPxcfHmAU&ved=2ahUKEwjV6Y6elMGRAxXWlYkEHWAzBAUQgK4QegQIARAC&uact=5&oq=Software+Composition+Analysis+.NET+10+&gs_lp=Egxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAiJlNvZnR3YXJlIENvbXBvc2l0aW9uIEFuYWx5c2lzIC5ORVQgMTAgMgUQIRigATIFECEYoAEyBRAhGKABMgUQIRigAUjNHFD8CViFGnACeAGQAQCYAXugAdwGqgEDNS40uAEDyAEA-_sxsgcDNS40uAeIB8IHBzAuNi40LjHIByqACAA&sclient=gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfB7aXZlTb4E6TXDbxMqNkcapR_VjwixMHScEarqWPQXtc3cNZvBFVuilShNQJgLSZ46MR6DXMJzltArUh0cfI1It4eYxAwR2kSpz4nPZop2zdRZOgG9a58VvlU7JxZzL3F2A58CBD9zWOeCoZNIEmlTPKlFp4sNB7bh-KxGO4aRu-5mOhXSCHMHN7DzqY2t65sNs4icvFWSknIh28PJPN2FCPZEVm4m3Gv07kLHTjzMQQw0Lbvv6IQgPYNFJHx25dbhJobKzEYFGPKg0urDfUE8&csui=3), [Black directly into the .NET development lifecycle (CI/CD). It's crucial for modern DevSecOps, offering automated scanning, risk reporting, and remediation guidance for third-party code.
